Tucson listens to Rodimus and Legacy but as always he was going to prepare =
a reason for his actions, and before he can even speak, the inevitable happ=
ens.  He falls to one knee and then to the other.  The battery fluid loss h=
ad indeed taken him.  

Quickstride and Uproar are quick to try and catch h=
im.

"Woahh, Rodimus and Legacy have a point Sir.  It's time you took care =
of your own needs."

Replies Quickstride as he and Uproar now help him to h=
is feet.  Tucson still had that apprehension.  Although he needed help, he =
still felt that the needs of his comrades had to come first.

" My - own ne=
eds - can wait.  The - others need help more than I do."

Straight Shot cou=
ld see what was happening.

"Stubborn as usual.  C'mon Tucson, Rodimus and =
Legacy are right, you need ta take care of yourself! I know what happened i=
n the past was hard for you ta take, but that wasn't your fault!  You got s=
truck from behind by Cyclonus, and there was no way of predicting that!"

T=
ucson sighs.

"I - could have prevented it though.  And I - can't - let it =
happen again."

Straight Shot could see that Tucson did need help urgently.=


"Legacy, please get Tucson ta the CR Chambers ASAP.  And make sure he act=
ually takes your advice."

Tucson couldn't say anything else.  He knew his =
little sister was right.

Straight Shot looks to Rodimus now knowing why Tu=
cson was acting as he was.  It wasn't out of revenge, it was out of compass=
ion, and guilt.  But a guilt he did not deserve to carry.

" He feels reall=
y bad about what happened..  He thinks that your disappearence and abductio=
n was his fault.  In all truths it was no one's fault but Hydras's.  Before=
 he became a Prime, he really took his job seriously and still does but bac=
k then, for an Autobot, he was all dedication and didn't care what kind of =
consequences he'd face while going above and beyond the call of duty.  All =
he cares about is his comrades, and even back then, his loyalty was soley f=
or you and the others.  He was always so proud to be working with you, and =
would do anything to uphold the level of heroism that's always expected of =
Autobot and Maximal kind.  Then, that day, the time you were taken from us.=
.  That was the day he was trying to divert enemy attentions away from you =
by doing what was highly uncharacteristic of himself.  Decoy work was alway=
s deemed for those who were natural built speedsters, but he's no speedster=
.  When he chose his form, he chose the working class vehicle, which is kno=
wn more for strength and durability than speed. But out of desperation to t=
ry and save you, he did what he normally didn't do, and then, that's when h=
e got shot by Cyclonus. It took him off line instantly.  He doesn't remembe=
r anything after that.  I was taken off line at the same time, but, I did s=
tay conscious enough to see the blast. Shortly after he went off line, I di=
d.  But strange, I remember more than he does.  And that's why he's acting =
as he is.  He's trying to sorta make up for lost time."

charging chamber, the fuzors also show

r. "But until then we must
